title: anbE unnai
sahitya:
anbE unnaik-kAdalittEn en AshaiyellAm pUjai malarAkki


anupallavi

  tan panik-kAlait-tangak-kadirgaLAl angam tazhuviyE pongum sukham aruL


caraNam    puttulagak-kalai ettanai bOdhittAi bhOgak-kanavugaL ettanai sAdhittAi
cittirak-kAviyam singAra Oviyam cittattil nATakam ettanai shuddhanE
